name: Glide (bluswimmer)
description:
Master the movement of your glider as the caverns continue to get tighter and tighter! The arrow keys will move your glider up and down. Keep your momentum in mind- you'll gain more speed when your glider is pointed downwards!

There are two gamemodes available:

  • Endless- Glide as far as you can without crashing!
  • Sprint- How fast can you complete the course?

Good luck, and happy gliding!
